name: Frog
description: A small, amphibious creature with smooth, moist skin, typically green or brown, allowing it to blend into its surroundings.
memorable: Its ability to jump considerable distances without a running start makes it interesting for environmental storytelling.
goals: Frogs feed on insects and often serve as a part of a larger ecosystem.
relations: May be found alongside other small aquatic creatures or as familiars for spellcasters in enchanted locations.
environment: Commonly found near ponds, swamps, or rivers.
strengths: Good mobility due to its jumping ability and adaptability to both aquatic and terrestrial environments.
weaknesses: Low physical and mental attributes make it extremely weak in combat and social situations.
attacks: Can perform a Bite attack, dealing minimal damage and having average hit capabilities.
most_powerful_ability: Amphibious ability allowing it to breathe both air and water.
senses: Has blindsight up to 30 feet and average passive perception.
skills: Possesses a skill bonus for stealth, allowing it to remain unnoticed in natural settings.
additional_information: Lacks effective attacks and poses no threat to adventurers.
Jump distance provides excellent escape capabilities.
Often part of the food chain, consuming insects and small creatures.
test_queries: small amphibious creature living near water
tiny green creature able to jump far
agile frog escaping threats through jumping
frog that breathes air and water
